name: POLYSPORTS
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
Polysports lets sports lovers participate and earn crypto while playing fantasy sports, collect and trade sports NFTs. Play Casual and RPG games in the metaverse.

The DeFi features on Polysports allows users to earn by participating in yield generating activities like staking tokens and NFTs, farming LP tokens and more.
